title: Regular Expressions
content: I've been called many names. But you can just know me as the man who will infiltrate the swamp

title: Coding Breakthrough
content: I gaze solemnly out of the car window. Droplets of rain slide down and collect on its surface. The pigeon-grey sky is clouded over and thick with cold crisp moisture. I turn to you and say what we have both been thinking: I want to growl at berries

title: CSS Issues - Linking
content: All proceeds from this bake sale will go toward my efforts to befriend the sun

title: Webex for All
content: It's finally time. I have completed my collection of 18000 small plastic shrimp and now I can drown in a sea of chicken nuggets?

title: Model of the Northern Mountains
content: *points to a huge boulder* this is my beautiful wife...together we fear fire
